name: Rakan Systems
tag_list: data-storage, denver, colorado, data-protection, storage-solutions, cloud-computing, it-solutions, storage, data, promise-technology, blade-server, blade-rack, cluster, server, workstation, raid, infiniband, supercomputer, teraflop, gigaglop, linux, redha
overview:
Rakan Systems offers Data Protection and Enterprise Storage Solutions to help you manage and protect your data as efficiently as possible. We are a nationwide VAR focused on SANs, NAS, Archive, DR Sites, Tape Libraries and Online Backup for SMB to Enterprise. We specialize in deploying the most cost effective data storage with the highest level of security and reliability. Helping IT professionals around the world simplify day to day tasks with a wealth of knowledge in the industry.

Rakan Systems is a privately held corporation that provides solutions and services for several markets including government, military, education, healthcare, and corporate America. We pride ourselves on maintaining strong relationships with both our customers and our vendors- this is the key to our ongoing and continued success. We strive every day to provide the most efficient solutions for our customers. More than just a reseller, we integrate a variety of hardware and software products to develop these solutions. Most importantly, we operate with the highest level of Professionalism throughout every facet of our organization.
